summary: Utility module that supports experiment management for a PyTorch deep metric learning project. It includes a lightweight CSV logger, a comprehensive logger for saving checkpoints, recording training and test metrics, visualizing metric trends and sample recoveries, as well as assorted helper functions for naming experiments, handling parameters, and evaluating retrieval metrics.
business_intent: Enable researchers and engineers to reliably track, evaluate, and reproduce model training runs by automating logging, checkpointing, metric computation, and result visualization within the Smooth AP training pipeline.
